entry.title: Jest Snapshot testing within Rails Webpacker
entry.summary:
Preable
Ah… The state of the Rails ecosystem couldn’t be better for me. With the supplementing of the asset pipeline with Webpacker the world of Javascript development has joined nicely with the world of Rails development.

entry.title: Storing images (or files) on S3 with Django
entry.summary: There comes a time when you need to upload stuff to your server via your Django app. You can upload it to the machine serving up your app (which isn’t a good idea in most cases) or upload it to a server/service which specializes in delivering you content
